# Changelog

## 3.1.0 (2024-04-10)

### Features

* feat: add support for custom themes ([a1b2c3d](https://github.com/example/project/commit/a1b2c3d))
* feat: implement drag-and-drop functionality ([e4f5g6h](https://github.com/example/project/commit/e4f5g6h))
* feat(api): add pagination to search endpoints ([i7j8k9l](https://github.com/example/project/commit/i7j8k9l))

### Bug Fixes

* fix: resolve infinite loop in data processing ([m0n1o2p](https://github.com/example/project/commit/m0n1o2p))
* fix(ui): correct button alignment on mobile devices ([q3r4s5t](https://github.com/example/project/commit/q3r4s5t))

### Performance Improvements

* perf: optimize database queries for large datasets ([u6v7w8x](https://github.com/example/project/commit/u6v7w8x))

## 3.0.0 (2024-03-01)

### ⚠ BREAKING CHANGES

* The configuration format has changed from YAML to TOML
* Minimum Node.js version is now 18.0.0

### Features

* feat: migrate to TypeScript 5.0 ([y9z0a1b](https://github.com/example/project/commit/y9z0a1b))
* feat: add real-time collaboration features ([c2d3e4f](https://github.com/example/project/commit/c2d3e4f))
* feat(api): implement GraphQL subscriptions ([g5h6i7j](https://github.com/example/project/commit/g5h6i7j))

### Bug Fixes

* fix: handle edge cases in date parsing ([k8l9m0n](https://github.com/example/project/commit/k8l9m0n))
* fix(auth): prevent token refresh race conditions ([o1p2q3r](https://github.com/example/project/commit/o1p2q3r))

## 2.8.0 (2024-02-15)

### Features

* feat: add dark mode support ([s4t5u6v](https://github.com/example/project/commit/s4t5u6v))
* feat(cli): add interactive configuration wizard ([w7x8y9z](https://github.com/example/project/commit/w7x8y9z))

### Bug Fixes

* fix: correct timezone handling in date picker ([a0b1c2d](https://github.com/example/project/commit/a0b1c2d))
* fix(db): prevent connection pool exhaustion ([e3f4g5h](https://github.com/example/project/commit/e3f4g5h))

### Documentation

* docs: update API reference with new endpoints ([i6j7k8l](https://github.com/example/project/commit/i6j7k8l))
* docs: add migration guide from v2 to v3 ([m9n0o1p](https://github.com/example/project/commit/m9n0o1p))
